languages.text: Слух оказался горькой неправдой — население мира у звезды Ледяной Принц не вознеслось, а было истреблено служителями Архиврага.
The rumour turned out to be a cruel lie. The population of the world near the Frozen Prince were granted no ascension — they were annihilated by the servants of the Archenemy.
languages.original_text: Слух оказался горькой неправдой — население мира у звезды Ледяной Принц не вознеслось, а было истреблено служителями Архиврага.

traits.locale_text: The rumour turned out to be a cruel lie. The population of the world near the Cold Prince were granted no ascension — they were annihilated by the servants of the Archenemy.
The rumour turned out to be a cruel lie. The population of the world near the Cold Prince were granted no ascension — they were annihilated by the servants of the Archenemy.
The rumour turned out to be a cruel lie. The population of the world near the Cold Prince were granted no ascension — they were annihilated by the servants of the Archenemy.
The rumour turned out to be a cruel lie. The population of the world near the Cold Prince were granted no ascension — they were annihilated by the servants of the Archenemy.

languages.text: 事实证明，那个传闻是个残忍的谎言。冰封亲王星附近世界的居民并没有前往帝皇的圣殿，而是被混沌大敌的仆人屠戮殆尽。
languages.original_text: The rumour turned out to be a cruel lie. The population of the world near the Frozen Prince were granted no ascension — they were annihilated by the servants of the Archenemy.

traits.locale_text: 事实证明，那个传闻是个残忍的谎言。冰封亲王星附近世界的居民并没有前往帝皇的圣殿，而是被混沌大敌的仆人屠戮殆尽。
事实证明，那个传闻是个残忍的谎言。冰冷王子行星附近世界的居民并没有前往帝皇的圣殿，而是被混沌大敌的仆人屠戮殆尽。

languages.text: その噂は残酷な嘘であることが判明した。凍結の王子周辺の惑星の住民は昇天を認められず、渾沌の勢力の使徒たちによって全滅させられたのだ。
languages.original_text: The rumour turned out to be a cruel lie. The population of the world near the Frozen Prince were granted no ascension — they were annihilated by the servants of the Archenemy.

traits.locale_text: その噂は残酷な嘘であることが判明した。凍結の王子周辺の惑星の住民は昇天を認められず、渾沌の勢力の使徒たちによって全滅させられたのだ。
その噂は残酷な嘘であることが判明した。コールド・プリンス周辺の惑星の住民は昇天を認められず、宿敵の使徒たちによって全滅させられた。

languages.text: El rumor ha resultado ser una cruel mentira. La población del mundo cercano al Príncipe Helado no recibió ascensión alguna: fue masacrada por los sirvientes del Archienemigo.
languages.original_text: The rumour turned out to be a cruel lie. The population of the world near the Frozen Prince were granted no ascension — they were annihilated by the servants of the Archenemy.

traits.locale_text: El rumor ha resultado ser una cruel mentira. La población del mundo cercano al Príncipe Helado no recibió ascensión alguna: fue masacrada por los sirvientes del Archienemigo.

languages.text: Die Gerüchte haben sich als grausame Lüge entpuppt. Die Bewohner der Welt unweit des Gefrorenen Prinzen waren nicht aufgestiegen, sondern von den Schergen des Erzfeindes ausgelöscht worden.
languages.original_text: The rumour turned out to be a cruel lie. The population of the world near the Frozen Prince were granted no ascension — they were annihilated by the servants of the Archenemy.

traits.locale_text: Die Gerüchte haben sich als grausame Lüge entpupppt. Die Bewohner der Welt unweit des Kalten Prinzen waren nicht aufgestiegen, sondern von den Schergen des Erzfeindes ausgelöscht worden.

languages.text: La rumeur s'est révélée un cruel mensonge. La population du monde près du Prince Gelé n'a connu aucune ascension. Elle a été décimée par les serviteurs du Grand Ennemi.
languages.original_text: The rumour turned out to be a cruel lie. The population of the world near the Frozen Prince were granted no ascension — they were annihilated by the servants of the Archenemy.

traits.locale_text: La rumeur s'est révélée un cruel mensonge. La population du monde près du Prince Gelé n'a connu aucune ascension. Elle a été décimée par les serviteurs du Grand Ennemi.
La rumeur s'est révélée un cruel mensonge. La population du monde près du Prince Gelé n'a connu aucune ascension. Elle a été décimée par les serviteurs du Grand Ennemi.

languages.text: Söylentilerin zalimce bir yalan olduğu ortaya çıktı. Donmuş Prens'in yakınlarındaki dünyada yaşayanlar miraca yükselmemiş, Şerbaşı'nın hizmetkârları tarafından yok edilmiş.
languages.original_text: The rumour turned out to be a cruel lie. The population of the world near the Frozen Prince were granted no ascension — they were annihilated by the servants of the Archenemy.

traits.locale_text: Söylentilerin zalimce bir yalan olduğu ortaya çıktı. Donmuş Prens'in yakınlarındaki dünyada yaşayanlar miraca yükselmemiş, Şerbaşı'nın hizmetkârları tarafından yok edilmiş.
Söylentilerin zalimce bir yalan olduğu ortaya çıktı. Soğuk Prens'in yakınlarındaki dünyada yaşayanlar miraca yükselmemiş, Şerbaşı'nın hizmetkârları tarafından yok edilmiş.
